text: Wizard Entertainment Inc. was a producer of fan meetings in different parts of North America. It used to be known as Wizard World. The company first started as Wizard Press in 1991. Back then, it used to publish monthly magazine called Wizard. By 2011, they stopped their magazine publication and focused mainly on their fan events. In 2021, they sold their events business to FanExpo. == Reflist == Category:Comics conventions Category:Comics publishing companies
title: Wizard Entertainment
